channel.title: The Hon. John Sununu
channel.description: The Hon. John Sununu Former Governor of New Hampshire (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: In these critical times America needs a leader.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: Our economy is stagnant.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: Our vitality has been sapped.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: Our confidence is down.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: We are saddled with a failed presidency, with an incumbent president who has not led.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: America needs real change, and we are here to affirm a leader who will produce that change.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: There are many reasons America needs Mitt Romney at the helm.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: We have 23 million Americans unemployed or underemployed because Barack Obama cannot figure out what makes free enterprise work.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: Mitt Romney will get our private sector moving again, and will respect the successes of our entrepreneurs who deserve credit because they really did build it.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: In these difficult times our nation still depends on others for our energy resources ­ even though we share the largest overall supplies of energy in the world ­ because we have an administration that shuns those assets and keeps us dependent on fragile foreign supplies.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: Mitt Romney will unshackle our assets, and lead us to real energy independence. We also are a nation that has seen erosion of our respect around the world because we have a president who prefers to lead from behind.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: Mitt Romney will restore our strength, support our friends, face up to our foes and regain honest respect for an America willing to lead.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: My wife Nancy and I have gotten to know Mitt and Ann Romney well.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: We have developed a deep and sincere appreciation for these two friends and their family ­ we like them and we respect them.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: Tonight we all gather here to put in motion the final phase of our campaign to help America know them better, and to appreciate why our nation needs them as our president and first lady.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: Mitt Romney is a good man, and a smart man. He is compassionate and generous.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: He is a great father and a supportive friend.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: He has been a very successful businessman and a very effective governor.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: He knows how to fix the unfixable, and to help people perform to their highest potential.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: Mitt Romney is the right man at the right time and will be a great leader for our country.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu

item.title: It is my honor to nominate Mitt Romney for the Office of President of the United States of America.
item.author: The Hon. John Sununu
